carousel.heading: Wastewater & Water Process Solutions
carousel.subheading: Innovative service and superior support meeting demands of evolving markets and new technologies.

whatWeDo.heading: WHAT WE DO
whatWeDo.paragraph: Aquachem supplies functional polymers, coagulants, and other chemistries to assist Industrial/Municipal Water and Wastewater Treatment Plants improve their operating cost-efficiencies in critical liquid-solid separation processes. Including a full line of NSF-certified and approved for potable water treatment.

about.heading: ABOUT US
about.paragraph: We provide the highest level of service and superior customer support while selling quality products at a great value. Our cost-effective solutions, experience, and superior focus on our customers' needs allow us to build long-term, mutual benefiting relationships with our customers.

solutions.heading: Whether it's Chemical Supply or Full Programming our Solutions Scale to Support Various Industries

productsAndServices.heading: PRODUCTS & SERVICES
productsAndServices.paragraph: From chemical programming and laboratory evaluations to equipment delivery and field service, we provide solutions for wastewater and water processing for a wide array of industries. Aquachem strives to meet the demands of the ever evolving markets we serve as well as innovate and develop new technologies to support these programs.

callout: All our products are available in bulk, totes, or drums.

fieldSupport.heading: FIELD SUPPORT
fieldSupport.paragraph: Aquachem provides experienced field service personnel to support our products, provide customer training, assist in problem-solving, and to offer technical assistance.

labTesting.heading: LAB TESTING
labTesting.paragraph: Aquachem laboratories provides a full service dewatering evaluation which will provide flocculant and coagulant recommendations along with product pricing for all dewatering, settling, and clarification applications. All samples are to be sent in a seal tight container with a minimum sample size of 1 gallon. Evaluations take 1-2 weeks.

contactCallout: For General Inquiries, Questions or Concerns, Please contact us at 920.687.5238.
